lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic is in the kind of form that has rivals no less than Rafael Nadal describing it as being close to perfection. Serena Williams has been injured, has hardly played since the U.S. Open and had to withdraw from her only tune-up event ahead of the Australian Open.

headline.main: Djokovic, Williams Prepared for Australian Open Defenses
headline.print_headline: Djokovic, Williams Prepared for Australian Open Defenses
